items.sentence: I\'m asking you because you\'re here right now.
We\'re not planning on doing that anytime soon.
Tom convinced Mary to go to the dance with him.
Don\'t worry. There\'ll be plenty to go around.
What\'s standing between us and that happening?
All of us went to Tom\'s party except for Mary.
Am I the only one that doesn\'t agree with you?
Tom is going to be fired if he does that again.
I don\'t remember where I bought this umbrella.
I don\'t think Tom knows much about basketball.
